ModelEvent - Class in fko.chessly.mvc.ModelEvents

The ModelEvent class is the base class for Events send from the ModelObservable to the ModelObservers.

ModelEvent() - Constructor for class fko.chessly.mvc.ModelEvents.ModelEvent
Creates a ModelEvent with a unique name and the default signal (0).
ModelEvent(String) - Constructor for class fko.chessly.mvc.ModelEvents.ModelEvent
Creates a ModelEvent with the given name and the default signal (0).
ModelEvent(int) - Constructor for class fko.chessly.mvc.ModelEvents.ModelEvent
Creates a ModelEvent with a unique name and the given signal.
ModelEvent(String, int) - Constructor for class fko.chessly.mvc.ModelEvents.ModelEvent
Creates a ModelEvent with the given name and the given signal.
ModelObservable - Class in fko.chessly.mvc

The ModelObservable class overrides notifyObserver(Object arg) to only allow ModelEvents objects as arguments: notifyObserver(ModelEvent me).
